DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of Brimonidine/Timolol Fixed Combination in patients with glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Brimonidine/Timolol Fixed Combination in Patients With Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of ocular hypertension or chronic glaucoma in both eyes Patient requires IOPlowering drug in both eyes Uncontrolled medical conditions contraindication to betaadrenoceptor antagonist or brimonidine therapy
